text: Here you are, those (who) love/like them, and they do not love/like you, and you believe with The Book, all of it, and (when) they met you, they said: "We believed." And if they were alone/together they bit on you the fingertips from the anger/rage . Say: "Die with your anger/rage, that God (is) knowledgeable with (what is) in the chests (innermosts)
